uni.hamburg.yamms.solver
Class EulerSolver

java.lang.Object
  uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.Solver
      uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.StochasticSolver
          uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.EulerSolver

public class EulerSolver
extends StochasticSolver

Implementation of the Euler integration scheme with support for thermal activation via an fluctuating field.

You better use the Heun integrator, since this integrator was only built for demonstration purposes.

Author:
Claas Abert

Constructor Detail

EulerSolver

public EulerSolver(double stepSize,
                   long seed,
                   double temperature,
                   boolean drift)
Standard constructor

Parameters:
stepSize - the step size used for integration
seed - the seed for the random generation of the fluctuating field
temperature - the temperature in K
drift - if true the drift term for the stratonovish stochastic integral interpretation is added

EulerSolver

public EulerSolver(double stepSize,
                   long seed,
                   double temperature)
Alternative constructor. The drift term is activated

Parameters:
stepSize - the step size used for integration
seed - the seed for the random generation of the fluctuating field
temperature - the temperature in K
